## Encrption / Decryption Example / functions using RSA public key cryptography algorithm

##  Setup:
    * cd rsa_example
    * pip3 install -r requirements.txt
    * chmod +x rsa.py

## requirements:
    cryptography

## Usage

### encrypt command: 
./rsa.py encrypt --public public.pem --text 1231243


### decrypt command: 
./rsa.py decrypt --private private.pem --text
